title: Content Spoofing @ https://irclogs.wordpress.org/
vulnerability_information:
Hello,

Greetings,

Today I was Free So I Decided to Do Pentest WordPress So i Found a SubDomain which is Vulnerable to Plain text Content Spoofing.

PoC:-
Url:-
https://irclogs.wordpress.org/chanlog.php?channel=wordpress&day=[Message Goes Here]&sort=asca
Example:-
https://irclogs.wordpress.org/chanlog.php?channel=wordpress&day=today%20is%20not%20found%20because%20Wordpress%20Is%20Currently%20Down%20Kindly%20Visit%20Phishing.com%20and%20Login%20with%20Your%20Account%20For%20Further%20Details.%20Regards,%20Wordpress%20Team.&sort=asca

Thanks,
Abdulwahab Khan,
Independent Cyber Security Researcher
vulnerability_information_html:
Hello,

Greetings,

Today I was Free So I Decided to Do Pentest WordPress So i Found a SubDomain which is Vulnerable to Plain text Content Spoofing.

PoC:-
Url:-
https://irclogs.wordpress.org/chanlog.php?channel=wordpress&day=%5BMessage Goes Here]&sort=asca
Example:-
https://irclogs.wordpress.org/chanlog.php?channel=wordpress&day=today%20is%20not%20found%20because%20Wordpress%20Is%20Currently%20Down%20Kindly%20Visit%20Phishing.com%20and%20Login%20with%20Your%20Account%20For%20Further%20Details.%20Regards,%20Wordpress%20Team.&sort=asca

Thanks,
Abdulwahab Khan,
Independent Cyber Security Researcher

activities.message:
Hi @hackerwahab,

Thanks for the report! We've verified the reported plaintext content spoofing for the `day` query argument (and also for `channel`). We don't believe there to be security implications related to the issues, so it'll be more a matter of hardening. We'll commit fixes for these shortly and provide an update here once we do. We won't mark this ticket as resolved (and thus make it eligible for bounty fulfillment) until the fixes are deployed to the site. Again, we'll keep you updated.
activities.markdown_message:
Hi @hackerwahab,

Thanks for the report! We've verified the reported plaintext content spoofing for the day query argument (and also for channel). We don't believe there to be security implications related to the issues, so it'll be more a matter of hardening. We'll commit fixes for these shortly and provide an update here once we do. We won't mark this ticket as resolved (and thus make it eligible for bounty fulfillment) until the fixes are deployed to the site. Again, we'll keep you updated.

activities.message:
@hackerwahab: The fixes for the reported issue have been committed to the repository for the code powering the site:

* [[467-code]](https://code.trac.wordpress.org/changeset/467): Validate day string format before use.
* [[470-code]](https://code.trac.wordpress.org/changeset/470): Validate channel name before use.

A request has been made to our systems team to deploy the code to production. Once they've done so, I'll follow up here to resolve the ticket and recommend the bounty.
activities.markdown_message:
@hackerwahab: The fixes for the reported issue have been committed to the repository for the code powering the site:

  • [467-code]: Validate day string format before use.
  • [470-code]: Validate channel name before use.

A request has been made to our systems team to deploy the code to production. Once they've done so, I'll follow up here to resolve the ticket and recommend the bounty.

activities.message: @hackerwahab: The aforementioned fixes have now been deployed to the production site so this issue is now resolved.
activities.markdown_message: @hackerwahab: The aforementioned fixes have now been deployed to the production site so this issue is now resolved.

activities.message:
Hey @hackerwahab,

As a thank you for contributing to the security of WordPress, we’d love to send some special swag your way — a WordPress Logo Black Zip Hoodie. We will need to know the following details: preferred size (Unisex S-XXL), shipping address, and phone number (needed for international shipments, as this will be coming from the US).

Please also allow us a little extra time as we are having to get more hoodies printed and the fulfillment and shipping is currently a manual process for us.

Thanks,
Aaron
activities.markdown_message:

Please also allow us a little extra time as we are having to get more hoodies printed and the fulfillment and shipping is currently a manual process for us.

Thanks,
Aaron

Thanks,
Aaron
